root: ^You were just walking out of the subway station when you bumped into her.
^A slim, middle-aged woman, her physique hidden under that baggy chef’s jacket.
^The round, edgeless silhouette sharpens that oh-so-delicate face of hers.
^She dropped her handbag. A few carefully wrapped packages rolled onto the ground.
^She looked lost for a brief moment.
^“You're all good, ma’am. Have a nice day.”
^It’s getting late. You did someone a small favor, nothing worth mentioning. You smiled a little, starting to walk upstairs.
^“Sir, you do look tired, and hungry, if I may, sir. You must allow me to apologize again for my improper behaviors. Now would you please let me show you a good place for dinner?”
^She looks at you, lips curling up in a way that’s hard to not to stare at.
^“It should be quick! I work there, and it’s pretty close. I must repay your kindness or I’d drown in guilt.”
^“It’s nothing but…any human with basic decency would do it, ma’am. I really do not want to bring any inconvenience to you…”
^She stepped closer to you. Her perfume was of a warm, nutty note, surrounded you. It’s almost suffocating breathing that close to her.
^You were dragged alongside her before any protest could come out.
